name: GitIntegrationPlugin
description: Provides comprehensive Git integration for repository management, including cloning, committing, branching, and interacting with remotes.
author: ApexAgent Team

actions.name: clone_repository
actions.description: Clones a Git repository from a given URL to a local path.

parameters.name: repository_url
parameters.description: The URL of the Git repository to clone.

parameters.name: local_path
parameters.description: The local directory path to clone the repository into.

actions.name: get_status
actions.description: Gets the status of a local Git repository.

parameters.name: local_path
parameters.description: The path to the local Git repository.

actions.name: add_files
actions.description: Adds specified files to the staging area in a local Git repository. Use ['.'] to add all changes.

parameters.name: local_path
parameters.description: The path to the local Git repository.

parameters.name: files
parameters.description: A list of file paths to add, relative to the repository root, or ['.'] to add all.

actions.name: commit_changes
actions.description: Commits staged changes in a local Git repository with a given message.

parameters.name: local_path
parameters.description: The path to the local Git repository.

actions.name: push_changes
actions.description: Pushes committed changes from a local branch to a remote repository.

parameters.name: local_path
parameters.description: The path to the local Git repository.

parameters.name: remote_name
parameters.description: The name of the remote repository (e.g., 'origin').

parameters.name: branch_name
parameters.description: The name of the local branch to push. Defaults to the current branch.

actions.name: pull_changes
actions.description: Pulls changes from a remote repository into the current local branch.

parameters.name: local_path
parameters.description: The path to the local Git repository.

parameters.name: remote_name
parameters.description: The name of the remote repository (e.g., 'origin').

parameters.name: branch_name
parameters.description: The name of the remote branch to pull. Defaults to the current branch's tracking branch.

actions.name: create_branch
actions.description: Creates a new branch in a local Git repository.

parameters.name: local_path
parameters.description: The path to the local Git repository.

parameters.name: branch_name
parameters.description: The name for the new branch.

parameters.name: checkout
parameters.description: If true, checkout the new branch after creation.

actions.name: checkout_branch
actions.description: Checks out an existing branch in a local Git repository.

parameters.name: local_path
parameters.description: The path to the local Git repository.

parameters.name: branch_name
parameters.description: The name of the branch to checkout.

actions.name: list_branches
actions.description: Lists all local branches in a Git repository.

parameters.name: local_path
parameters.description: The path to the local Git repository.
